meanings.definition: A Scottish slang term for money.
meanings.sent1: He found some bawbees in his pocket.
meanings.sent3: The leprechaun's pot of gold was full of bawbees.
meanings.sent4: The bawbees jingled in the old tin can.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's purse was heavy with bawbees.

meanings.sent1: He only had a few bawbees left after shopping.
meanings.sent2: She saved up her bawbees to buy a toy.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of shiny bawbees.
meanings.sent4: The bawbees in the jar seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent5: The child's eyes lit up at the sight of the bawbees.

meanings.sent1: She decided to bawbees for a new bike.
meanings.sent2: He bawbees diligently for his future.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel bawbees nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: They bawbees every penny for their dream vacation.
meanings.sent5: Bawbees wisely now to enjoy later.
